price: 57. Waarlijk! Degenen die in ontzag en vrees voor hun Heer leven;
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ هُم مِّنۡ خَشۡيَةِ رَبِّهِم مُّشۡفِقُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna hum min khashyati rabbihim mush'fiqūna
